name: MainFighter
description:
MainFighter

In MainFighter, you play a fighter in a planet's atmosphere. Your goal is to defeat all enemy spacecraft to win that bet you made with Droid X2 yesterday.

Current Version: V1.0 (Made for TIC-80 Version 0.47.0)

Controls: Arrow Keys for Movement; Z for Shooting (Customisable with ESC)

Also available on the official TIC-80 Website: https://tic.computer/play?cart=287

This game was made in TIC-80.

Made for #FC_JAM 2 (Theme: You're not the main character).
